message.content: {"given_definition_quality":95,"better_definition":"east","sentence":"东边有一个家。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style illustration showing a small house on the right side of the image, under a sky with warm light coming from the right (representing the east). In the background, vague ruins and faded structures can be seen, but the house looks peaceful and inviting. The overall color palette includes pastel and gentle tones, with soft-edged clouds and grass. Focus on the concept of 'east' in the scene.","sentence_translation":"There is a home on the east side."}
